Description.Text: "Mela" means "apple" in Italian, and the name is apt. Hotel Mela is located in the center of The Big Apple, just steps from Times Square and near Broadway theaters. The small, modern lobby is outfitted in red, white, and black tones, with artfully arranged flowers, a bowl of crisp apples, and stylish Italian floor lamps. Recessed lighting in the ceiling casts a sunset-red glow.

Guestrooms at this New York hotel feature 26-inch LCD TVs with HBO, clock radios/CD players with MP3 connections, and complimentary wireless Internet access (surcharge for wired high-speed Internet access). Beds are designed for comfort, with 350-thread-count cotton linens and soft duvets. Stylish contemporary decor includes soothing earth tones with moss-green accents, mahogany furniture, and New York-themed artwork. Bathrooms feature cotton Turkish towels, waffle-weave robes, and premium H20+ toiletries with sea-derived ingredients. Many bathrooms have rainfall showerheads.

This Midtown New York hotel is in the heart of the Broadway Theater District and a half-block from the dazzle and excitement of Times Square. Fifth Avenue, Rockefeller Center, the Top of the Rock observation deck, and Grand Central Terminal are among the many popular destinations within four blocks. Major subway stops are within two blocks of Hotel Mela. Relatively small by New York standards, Hotel Mela offers friendly, personalized service in a contemporary setting. In addition to complimentary wireless Internet access throughout, amenities include a concierge desk, business services, a fitness center, and a bistro serving French fare. Valet parking is available in a secure garage.
